title: The X jewel,
author: Moncreiff, Fred. Chas.
snippet: Most of them were alive to the necessity for secrecy on this raid, and I had little dillicultv in restraining them from the ordinar^^ amenities of the JJorder ; but in some the taint of sin was too strong to be wholly suppressed, and there were a few sheep and goats, Avith a bullock or two, in our ranks when I disbanded them by Oxnam Water.
